original_text: And the seed of Israel separated themselves from all strangers, and stood and confessed their sins, and the iniquities of their fathers.
korean_text: 모든 이방 사람들과 절교하고 서서 자기의 죄와 조상들의 허물을 자복하고

sentences.original_text: And the seed of Israel separated themselves
and stood and confessed their sins
and the iniquities of their fathers
